snippet.title: Moroi Springs | Winterlore Chapter II - Trailer
snippet.description:
There’s a new obstacle in Moroi Springs. What is it this time around? Find out by playing Winterlore Chapter II on iOS, Android, PC & Mac! Links below 🔽

Follow the story of Ozana and her new found powers. The traditions she knew inside out bring a new meaning to her way of life and to Mamaie’s customs. 
She’ll mend herbs, brew concoctions and cook sweets for the solstice feast. Along the way she’ll encounter guests bringing in new beginnings, while others appear uninvited into the home. 

----------

Play Winterlore Chapter II:
⇸ iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/winterlore-ii/id1544613843
⇸ PC & Mac: https://moroisprings.itch.io/winterlore-ii
⇸ Android: Coming Soon

Play Winterlore Chapter I:
⇸ iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/winterlore-i/id1500119397?mt=8
⇸ PC & Mac: https://moroisprings.itch.io/zestre
⇸ Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.moroisprings.winterlore

Stay in touch
⇸ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MoroiSprings/
⇸ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/moroisprings/
⇸ Web: https://www.moroisprings.com/

🖤MS

----------
Music & sounds courtesy of www.zapsplat.com
